GSP33yaissi_u:4: tatra mīmāṃsakāḥ prāhuḥ - nāyaṃ sarvārthadarśanaśaktisampannaḥ puruṣo 'bhyupagamamarhati,
GSP33yaissi_u:11: bhaktyā dhyānābhyāsāt prakaṭaḥ prajñāṃ tanotu me śubhrām // 2 //
GSP33yaissi_u:12_0: atha khalu tatrabhavān paramācāryaḥ śrīmadbhagavadyāmunamunirātmacintāṃ vidhāyātmasiddhau
GSP33yaissi_u:13: samastamaṃ cetanācatanātmakaṃ jagat ekasya - sarveśvarasya vaśe - icchāyāṃ saṅkalpalakṣaṇāyāṃ pravartateprakarṣeṇa vartate - asaṅkīrṇasvarūpasvabhāvavyavasthamāste,
GSP33yaissi_u:14: pravartate ca sve sve karmaṇi yathāyathamiti kṛtsnasya sarveśvarasaṅkalpādhīnasvarūpasthitipravṛttikatvaṃ sādhayituṃ - pramāṇato vyavasthāpayituṃ,
GSP33yaissi_u:20: sarvārthadarśanaśaktiśālinamavagamayatā hi deśakālasvabhāvaviprakarṣavyavadhānajuṣaḥ sarva evārthāstaddarśanaṃ śaktiśca gocarayitavyāni /
GSP33yaissi_u:21: na ca vidyamānendriyasannikarṣayogyakatipayaviṣayanipatavṛtterlaukikapratyakṣasya niravadhirayaṃ mahimā saṃbhāvanābhūmiriti kathamiva tadiha sādhanamiti manyemahi/
GSP33yaissi_u:22: 'nāyam' iti / sarvārthasākṣātkakārasarvakāryopajananaśakti sampannaścetanaviśeṣa īśvaraśabditaḥ sādhakābhāvādbādhakabalācca nāṅgīkartuṃ yogya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:24: atipatitā - apakrāntā sakalasādhakapramāṇasambhāvanā yasyāḥ evambhūtā bhūmirviṣayaḥ,
GSP33yaissi_u:26: atra iti 'atipatitasakalasādhakapramāṇasaṃbhāvanābhūmitvatvā' diti 'atipatitasakala sādhakapramāṇasaṃbhāvanābhūmitvatvā'diti vā pāṭhaḥ sambhāvyate /
GSP33yaissi_u:40: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ - cākṣuṣasya tāvat pratyakṣasya rūparūpirūpaikārthasamavetasaṅkhyādaya eva viṣayāḥ,
GSP33yaissi_u:42: udbhūtānabhibhūtameva rūpaṃ mahattvaikādhikaraṇaṃ grāhyaṃ na tu paramāṇvādigatamiti tatrāpi vyavasthitatā /
GSP33yaissi_u:46: sarvārthasya tadgrahaṇasya tacchakteśca grahaṇamantarā ca na tasya grahaṇaṃ ghaṭate /
GSP33yaissi_u:48: jñānasya bahirindriyāgrāhyatvādvāhyārthānāṃ ca kevalena manasāgrahānnendriyeṇa kenāpi sarvārthādergrahaṇam /
GSP33yaissi_u:66: arthasannikarṣasahakārīṇi bahirindriyāṇi jñānajananānīti tānyapi nātīte 'nāgate vār'the jñānaṃ janayantīti na tadupajanitaṃ pratyakṣaṃ yathoktaviṣayaniyamamatikrāmati /
GSP33yaissi_u:69: bāhyaviṣayamitiṣu ca manaso niraṅkuśakaraṇatāṅgīkāre hi kṛtaṃ cakṣurādibhiḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:70: ataśca na kaścidandho badhiro vā bhavet /
GSP33yaissi_u:71: bhavati cātra - vimatipadaṃ mano bahirindriyanirapekṣaṃ na bāhyapratyakṣagocare pravartate,
GSP33yaissi_u:73: yadyatra yattantravṛtti na tattannirapekṣaṃ tatra pravartate,
GSP33yaissi_u:78: na khalu suprayuktabheṣajaśatavihitasaṃskāramapi śrotraṃ rūparasavibhāgāvagamāya kalpate /
GSP33yaissi_u:85: atikrāmato vā kutaḥ pratkṣatvamiti na viśvānubhavaiśvaryaśālini pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam /
GSP33yaissi_u:92: naca sarvārthanirmāṇasākṣātkārapaṭīyasi liṅgaṃ sāmānyatodṛṣṭamapi kiñcana labhyate/
GSP33yaissi_u:101: sarvārtheṣvevambhūtā api padārthāḥ praviṣṭā iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:130: iha cāntyāvayavibhyaḥ prabhṛti ādvyaṇukakamakhilamavayavikramanihīyamānanānāvayavavyatiṣaṅgaviśeṣajanitamavagatam ityantata upādānaṃ caturvidhāḥ paramāṇavaḥ prapañcasya /
GSP33yaissi_u:134_0: na cāmī svasamavāyināvapi dharmādharmāvalamavalokayitumiti tadatirekī nikhilabhuvananirmāṇa
GSP33yaissi_u:171: atha tasya manomātrajanyatve 'pi na tatpramāṇatvaṃ sarvārthadyagrāhakatvādevetyāha ' nāpyāntare' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:175: manasaḥ sākṣādeva bāhyārthagrāhakatve doṣamāha ' niraṅkuśe' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:177: evaṃ manasi hetumupapādya sādhyaṃ prayogamukhataḥ sādhayati ' bhavatī ' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:201: cakṣuṣo hi svābhāvikaṃ sāmarthyaṃ rūparūpyādigrahaṇa eva,
GSP33yaissi_u:202: na tu yogādināpi rasādigrahaṇe sāmarthyaṃ tasya saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:203: tathāca pāṭavātiśayāddhavīyo 'pi sūkṣmatamaṃ rūpaṃ gṛhṇātu nāma yogicakṣuḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:207: maryādā ca cakṣuṣo rūpādiṣu caturṣu rūpasyaiva grāhakatvamiti /
GSP33yaissi_u:212: evamaindriyikatve yogijñānasya sarvārthādyagrāhakatvamupapādyānaindriyikatve 'pi tasya yathātvamata eveśvare pramāṇatvāsaṃbhavaṃ copapādayati ' bhāvane ' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:220: samuditāśayastvayam - anubhūtasya paunaḥpunyena smṛtyabhyāsena saṃskārapracayaḥ saṃpadyate /
GSP33yaissi_u:221: tatparyante smṛtyabhyāse sati jāyamānā smṛtirevapratyakṣavadviśadaviṣayāvabhāsā bhavatīti pratyakṣasamānākāraṃ smaraṇameva cedyogipratyakṣaṃ vivakṣitam ,
GSP33yaissi_u:225: ata eva pramāṇaviśeṣapratyakṣarūpatvaṃ tasya na tarāṃ
GSP33yaissi_u:231: sarvasākṣātkartari sarvakartari sarvaniyantari ceśvare 'smadādīnāṃ yogināṃ vendriyarūpaṃ pratyakṣaṃ na pramāṇaṃ - na pramitijanakamityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:232: nanu kevalasya bahirasvātantrye 'pi yogajaprakṛṣṭādṛṣṭasahakṛtasya tasya bāhyeṣvatīndriyeṣu traikālikeṣu cārtheṣu pravṛttiḥ saṃbhavennāma /
GSP33yaissi_u:233: tat prakṛṣṭādṛṣṭasahakṛtamanojanyameva pratyakṣaṃ yogināṃ syādīśvare pramāṇam /
GSP33yaissi_u:238: etena paramātmadhyānajanitameva paramātmaviṣayamānasapratyatraṃ pramāṇaṃ tasminnityapi nirastam /
GSP33yaissi_u:239: paramātmano dhyānaṃ hi tajjñānamantarā na saṃbhavati /
GSP33yaissi_u:241: śāstrasya ca kāryaparasya na tatra tātparyam /
GSP33yaissi_u:242: śrutipauruṣeyatvanaye punaranyonyasaṃśrayaḥ spaṣṭa eva īśvarasiddhau taduktatvācchāstraprāmāṇyasiddhiḥ,
GSP33yaissi_u:244: anumānaṃ ca na pramāṇaṃ tatretyanantarameva vakṣyate /
GSP33yaissi_u:246: evaṃ laukikayaugikabhedena dvividhasya pratyakṣasyeśvare na pramāṇatvamityuktam /
GSP33yaissi_u:247: kimasya tasminnāyattaṃ kiṃ nu janmāthavā sthitiḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:251: bhavati hi taducitādṛṣṭaśālināṃ sarveṣāmeva teṣāṃ taddehina iva tadutpattisthitinimittatvam /
GSP33yaissi_u:252: api ca śarīrāvayavinaḥ svāvayavasamavāyalakṣaṇā sthitiravayavavyatiṣaṅgaviśeṣādṛte na cetayitāraṃ paramapekṣate /
GSP33yaissi_u:254: na sā pakṣīkṛte kṣityādau sambhavatīti sthitimapi naikarūpāṃ pakṣasapakṣānuyāyinīmudīkṣāmahe /
GSP33yaissi_u:263: upādānādīnāṃ saṃvedī-sākṣātkartā yaścetanaḥ tena nimittahetunā kriyamāṇaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ ghaṭādikāryamityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:283: ādyaparispandasyādṛṣṭahetukatvaṃ ca kaṇādamuninā sūtritam 'agrerūrdhvajvalanaṃ vāyostiryakpavanamaṇūnāṃ manasaścādyaṃ karmādṛṣṭakāritam' iti /
GSP33yaissi_u:288_1: prayojanasākṣātkartṛtvādi jīveṣi na sa bhavatīti kaimutikanyāyena sādhayituṃ svīyādṛṣṭāsākṣātkartṛtvamapi
GSP33yaissi_u:293: tathācanikhilārthasākṣātkāritvādyantarā kartṛḥ kṣityādeḥ sakartṛkatvarūpaḥ prakṛtārtho na sidhyatīti viśiṣṭakartṛlābho 'dhikaraṇasiddhāntanayeneti phalitam /
GSP33yaissi_u:304: ekacetanāyattatvaṃ jagato vikalpya dūṣayati 'kimasye' ti kārikayā /
GSP33yaissi_u:317: taccharīrādhīnopabhogopakārabhājāmanyeṣāṃ ca tatrādṛṣṭadvārā hetutvaṃ taddehina ivāstīti ekacetanāyattotpattisthitikatvaṃ dṛṣṭānte nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:318: dvitīye kalpe sthitiśabdārthavikalpanamukhena dūṣaṇāntaramapyāha 'api ce' ti/
GSP33yaissi_u:321: ārambhakasaṃyoge 'vayavasamavete dṛḍhe sati svāvayavasamavetatvalakṣaṇāvayavinaḥ sthitiḥ śarīrasya nirābādhā ghaṭāderiva prasidhyatyeveti
GSP33yaissi_u:323_1: cetanāpekṣā dṛṣṭānte vyāpakatvena sādhanasya gṛhītaivaṃvidhā sthitistu na pakṣe mahyādau /
GSP33yaissi_u:331: adhikaṃ nāma nigrahasthānaṃ ca prayuñjata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:332: yadyapi samavetadravyatvarūpe phalite hetau na vaiyarthya prasaktiḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:336: cetanādhīnatvameva tu sādhyata iti cettatrāha 'cetana' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:340: asmākamapi kāryasāmānyasya jīvādṛṣṭahetukatvena cetanādhīnatvasya sampratipatteḥ cetanādhīnatvamātrasādhane jīvaiḥ sdidhasādhanam /
GSP33yaissi_u:343: sākṣātkartuṃ kṣamante yatsarva eva ca cetanāḥ // 8 //
GSP33yaissi_u:344: adyavadeva viśvambharādayaḥ karmaprāptāgantukopacayāpacayaikadeśaśālino na yugapadeva niravaśeṣavilayajananabhāgina ityantimaparamāṇusākṣātkāro na kartṛbhāvopayogī /
GSP33yaissi_u:347: kartṛtvaṃ ca kṣityādau jīvānāṃ nasaṃbhavatīti cet ;
GSP33yaissi_u:355_1: vacanācca tadanugrahata evānuṣṭhāya tattatkarma yathāvidhi samadhigatasāmarthyaviśeṣā
GSP33yaissi_u:355_3: ca sākṣātkṛtyopādāya ca jagatsṛjeyuriti na kartrantarakalpanāvakāśa iti /
GSP33yaissi_u:360: na khalu kulālādayaḥ kumbhādikāryamārabhamāṇāstadupādānopakaraṇa- bhūtamṛddaṇḍacakrādikāryotpādanaśaktiṃ sākṣātkṛtya tattadārabhante /
GSP33yaissi_u:361: yadi paraṃ śaktimaviduṣāmabhilaṣitasādhane tadupādānādivyavahāro 'nupapannaḥ, iha tu-
GSP33yaissi_u:362_0: nanu pralaye pṛthvyāderādyadvyaṇukaṃ vināśājjīvānāṃ ca tadā karaṇakale varavidhuratvena
GSP33yaissi_u:364: kintu vartamāna iva kāle bhāgabhedenaiva tau kramaśaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:366: tathāca jīveṣveva keṣāñcitsādhanaviśeṣasamāsāditajñānaśaktyatiśayānāṃ hīnāṃśaprapūraṇātmakaṃ sarjanaṃ pṛthivyādyupādānasākṣātkārāditaḥ saṃbhavedeva viśvāmitrādīnāmivetyarthaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:368: sāvaśeṣalaye tu jīvaviśeṣāṇāṃ tattadbhāgabhedakartṛtvaṃ saṃbhaviṣyatīti neśvarakalpanāvasara iti bhāvaḥ/
GSP33yaissi_u:371: tatsākṣātkāro na ca jīvānāṃ ghaṭata ityatrāha 'karmaṇaḥ' iti /
GSP33yaissi_u:383: api ca tadeva cetanakartṛkaṃ jagati paridṛśyate,
GSP33yaissi_u:385: na ca tathā mahīmahīdharamahārṇavādīti kathamiva tattatkāryatvam ?
GSP33yaissi_u:389_0: api cānīśvareṇa parimitaśaktijñānena vigrahavatānavāptakāmena kṛtamavagataṃ ghaṭādikāryamiti
GSP33yaissi_u:391: pramāṇāntaragocare hi liṅgini liṅgabalādāpatato viparītaviśeṣāṃstatpramāṇameva pratiruṇāddhi /
GSP33yaissi_u:392: iha punaratipatitasakalamānāntarakarmabhāve sarvanirmāṇanipuṇe siṣādhayiṣite yāvanto 'nvayavyatirekāvadhāritāvinābhāvabhājodharmāstānapyaviśeṣeṇopasthāpa yati /
GSP33yaissi_u:409: pralayasamaye pralīnasakalakaraṇakalevarādibhogopakaraṇatayā ca cetanānāṃ duḥkhābhāvāt duḥkhidarśanajanitakṛpāprayuktirapi nāstīti vyāpakabhūtasvārthakāruṇya
GSP33yaissi_u:432: viśiṣṭasādhyena gṛhītavyāptikaṃ ca śarīrādi viśiṣṭameva kartāraṃ sādhayet pakṣe /
GSP33yaissi_u:433: te cākārā abhimataviparītā iti viruddhavyāpyatvāddhetorviruddhatvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:434: nanvevaṃ sapakṣe mahānasādau kārīṣatvādimatā vahninā gṛhītavyāptinā dhūmena pakṣe parvate kārīṣādivahnereva sādhanaṃ syāt /
GSP33yaissi_u:435: sa ca tatra nāstīti aprāmāṇyaprasaṅgo 'numānamātrasyetyatrāha 'nacaivam' iti /
GSP33yaissi_u:437: sādhyasya pramāṇāntaragrahyatve liṅgabalātprasaktānāṃ viruddhaviśeṣāṇāṃ pratyakṣādināpavadanāt vahnimātre prāmāṇyamanumānasyavyavasthāpyaṃ bhavennāma /
GSP33yaissi_u:440: te kulālādyanugatā anīśvatvasaṃsāritvādayo bhavanti vyāpakatāvacchedakatvena gṛhītāḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:442: īśvarasya jatkartṛtvāsaṃbhavādapi niruktānumānamanīśvara eva viśrāmyatītyabhiprayannāha 'apace' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:445: svārthecchāyāḥ kāruṇyasya vā sattayā vyāpyaṃ buddimatpravṛttisāmānyamiti pūrvārdhasyārthaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:446: siṣādhayiṣitasyeśvarasya tvavāptakāmatvānna svārthaḥ sādhanīyaḥ kaścana sambhavati sṛṣṭihetuḥ,
GSP33yaissi_u:456: pratyutaḥ duḥkhālayaṃ jagatsṛjato na kāruṇyaleśo 'pi ghaṭata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:458: athāpi sṛjyakarmāpekṣayā sarjanānna nairghṛṇyādiprasaṅga ityatrāha 'tatkarme' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:460: ūśāvaro yadi jagatkartā syādanavāptakāmatvādimān syāditi pratitarko 'trānusandheyaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:473: īśvaraḥ kartā na bhavati prayojanarahitatvādaśarīratvādvā muktātmavaditi /
GSP33yaissi_u:475: jñanādiviśeṣaguṇoparāgeṇaivātmanaḥ pratyakṣatvāt jñānārthapravṛttivelāyāṃ nātmano jñānopādānabhūtasvātmasākṣātkāritvaṃ niyamato 'sti /
GSP33yaissi_u:477: jñānārtha pravṛtterjñane kartṛtvaṃ samavāyitvaṃ ca paramasti /
GSP33yaissi_u:478: tathā copādānādyabhijñapūrvakatvābhāvavati jñānādai kāryatvasya sattvādvyabhicāra ityarthaḥ/
GSP33yaissi_u:480_1: kāmatvaśarīritvādiviparītākārakṣepakatvāt kṣityādau kartuḥ siṣādhayiṣitasya kāryatvasya viruddhatvam /
GSP33yaissi_u:486: evamasiddhyādidoṣaduṣṭatvātkāryatvasya tena kṣityādau upādanopakaraṇādisākṣātkartṛ kartṛpūrvakatvaṃ na sādhayituṃ śakyata ityarthaḥ // 13 //
GSP33yaissi_u:487: atra brūmo na kāryatvaṃ kṣityādau śakyanihnavam /
GSP33yaissi_u:491: na cedṛśa eva sanniveśaḥ kāryaḥ netara ityavayavasanniveśaviśeṣapratiniyataṃ rūpabhedamudīkṣāmahe /
GSP33yaissi_u:492: yattu śakyakriyaṃ śakyajñānopādānopakaraṇaṃ ca kriyata ita,
GSP33yaissi_u:495: te ca kṣityādiṣu yathoktasādhanabalasamupasthāpite iti na viśeṣaḥ
GSP33yaissi_u:497: nacaitāvāneva kriyāgocara iti viṣayaniyamaḥ kaścit kriyāya dṛṣṭaḥ ;
GSP33yaissi_u:523: na hi kiñcit kriyamāṇaṃ karturarthāntaraviṣayamasāmarthyamajñānāṃ vā svotpatte 'pekṣate ;
GSP33yaissi_u:531: na khalu kumbhakāraḥ kumbhātireki kimapi na vijānāti /
GSP33yaissi_u:544: adhitiṣṭhāsitadehasaṃyogavata eva tatpravṛttyanuguṇa prayatnayogalakṣaṇamadhiṣṭhānaṃ dṛṣṭamiti cet ;
GSP33yaissi_u:551: tenādhiṣṭhānakriyāpekṣitādhiṣṭheyapadārthasambhandhamātrātirekeṇa dehasambandho nāmaparo nādartavyaḥ asti ceśvarasyāpi jagadupādānopakaraṇaissambandha ityuktameva /
GSP33yaissi_u:553: dṛṣṭaṃ hi daṇḍacakrādiṣu karasaṃyogādinā kulālādeḥ pravartayitṛtvamityucyeta ;
GSP33yaissi_u:556: kathamasati śarīre parapreraṇātmakaḥ saṅkalpa iti cet ;
GSP33yaissi_u:568: īdṛśena kartrā ghaṭādiṣu kāryatvasya sambandho na dṛṣṭa iti cet ;
GSP33yaissi_u:569: atigahanagiritaṭādhiṣṭhānenātiprakṛṣṭādṛṣṭacarendhananivahasambandhinā hutavahaviśeṣeṇa mahānasādau dhūmasya vā kiṃ sambandho dṛṣṭaḥ ?
GSP33yaissi_u:571: yādṛśo dhūmo yatrāvagataḥ tatraiva tādṛśastatsampādanasamarthau dṛṣṭāntabhūmāvaparidṛṣṭo 'pi sāmānyavyāptibalena pakṣadhramatāvaśāt sidhyatītita cet ;
GSP33yaissi_u:573: imāpi kāryatvaṃ samarthakartṛpūrvakatvena ghaṭādiṣu viditasambandhaniyamaṃ kṣityādiṣu dṛśyamānaṃ svasampādanasamarthamadṛṣṭapūrvameva buddhimatkartāramupasthāpayati /
GSP33yaissi_u:574: yathaiva hi deśakālendhanaparimāṇādiviśeṣānādareṇa dhūmasya svodayānuguṇahutavahamātreṇa sambndhaniyamaḥ,
GSP33yaissi_u:575_1: kāryasya svinirmāṇasamarkhabuddhimatkartṛmātreṇa sambandhaniyamaniścaya iti na kaścidviśeṣaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:576: api ca vibhudravyasaṃyoginaḥ parispandavataśca sarvatra sparśavattvāvyābhicāre 'pi jñānasukhādinityadravyaviśeṣaguṇānumitātmasaṃyogino manasaḥ kathamiva sparśarahitatvam ?
GSP33yaissi_u:577: kathaṃ na vāyavīyadravyasyamahimaguṇaśālino niyatādhiṣṭhānaspārśanatvaniyamadarśane 'pi tvagindriye tadviparyayaḥ ?
GSP33yaissi_u:578: taijasasya vā rūpasparśayoranyattarasya vā prākaṭyaniyame 'pi rūpopalambhasādhanatānumitataijasabhāsya cakṣuṣo niyamena tadubhayānudbhavābhyupagamaḥ ? /
GSP33yaissi_u:579: atha kāryadarśanānumitasadbhāvānāṃ taijasādibhāve 'pi tattadviśeṣāṇāṃ yogyānupalabdhibādhitatvāt tadabhyupagame 'nekaniyamabhaṅgaprasaṅgācca tathābhyupagamaḥ,
GSP33yaissi_u:580: hanta tarhi prakṛviṣaye 'pi prasaḍhañjitadharmaviśeṣāṇāmanupalambhabādhāviśeṣāt anekaniyamadarśanavighātaprasaṅgācca tathābhyupagama iti sarvaṃ samānamanyatrābhiniveśāt /
GSP33yaissi_u:590: kāryatvasya pakṣe kṣityādau asiddhisādhanāya prayoga uktaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:591: atha jīvaiḥ siddhasādhanatvasādhanārtha pralayanirāse prayoga ucyate 'vimatī' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:592: sati hi pralaye sargārambhesraṣṭṛtvaṃ jīvānāṃ karaṇādividhuratvānna ghaṭata iti kartrantaraṃ mantavyaṃ bhavet /
GSP33yaissi_u:601: evaṃ mīmāṃsakaidrūṣitameveśvarānumānaṃ tārkikaprakriyāmevāvalambya prāyaśo vyavaśthāpayitumupakramate doṣoddhāramukhena 'atra brūma'ityādinā /
GSP33yaissi_u:607: paricchinnaparimāṇavattvarūpaṃ mūrtatvaṃ ca nityaparamāṇusādhāraṇamiti sāmānādhikaraṇyasambandhena mahattvaviśiṣṭaṃ taddetūkṛtam /
GSP33yaissi_u:609: tacac kevalaṃ nityaparamāṇvādisādhāraṇamiti bāhyapratyakṣaviṣayatvena viśeṣitaṃ taddhetūkṛtam /
GSP33yaissi_u:610: ātmano mānasapratyakṣatvātsāmānyaviśeṣavattvācca tatra vyabhicāra iti bāhyatvena pratyakṣaṃ viśeṣitam // 14 // 15 //
GSP33yaissi_u:616: kartāṃ vināpi kāraṇāntarata eva kṣityāderutpattisambhavādityatrāha 'na cedṛśa' iti /
GSP33yaissi_u:618: tacca puruśakṛtisādhyameva dṛṣṭamiti vicitrākārasya mahyaderapi sakartṛkatvameṣṭavyameva /
GSP33yaissi_u:620: sa ca viśeṣo na kṣoṇyādivyāvṛtta iti tasyāpi sakartṛkatvasiddhirapratihatā /
GSP33yaissi_u:622: kartṛtvāvacchinnasya kāraṇatvamastyeveti kāryatvameva sakartṛkatvavyāpyaṃ kṣityādau kartāraṃsamarthayatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:623: yadvā kṣityādi na kāryaṃ prasiddhakāryavilakṣaṇatvādityatrāprayojakatvamāha 'na cedṛśa' iti/
GSP33yaissi_u:626: kṛtijanyatve vā prayojakaṃ kṣoṇyādyākāravyāvṛttaṅghaṭādyākāramātravṛttidharmaviśeṣaṃ na paśyāma ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:628: anyathā tvaprayojakatvameva adṛṣṭakartṛko rājaprāsādo na kāryo daṣṭakartṛkaghaṭādikāryavilakṣaṇatvādityādivaditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:629: nanu śakyakriyatvādireva tādṛśoviśeṣaḥ kṣityādyākṛtivyāvṛtta iti cettatrāha 'yattu'iti /
GSP33yaissi_u:640: prāmāṇike ca kāryatve sati kāryatvasya viśiṣṭakartṛpūkatvavyāptibalāt kṣityādau kartṛviśeṣasiddhirapratyūhaiveti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:645: evaṃ kāryatvaṃ kṣityādestataḥ sakartṛkatvaṃ ca sādhitam /
GSP33yaissi_u:646: atha sakartṛkatvānumānasya jīvaiḥ siddhasādhanatāṃ parihartuṃ kartṛtvesvarūpānupraviṣṭamadhiṣṭānādi vivṛṇoti 'adhiṣṭhāna' mityādinā /
GSP33yaissi_u:650: īśvarasannikarṣaḥ paramāṇvādau saṃyogarūpaḥ adṛṣṭe ca saṃyuktasamavāyarūpo vibhuddhayasaṃyogasyopagame /
GSP33yaissi_u:656: idaṃ puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vāsmin deśe kāle ca phalaṃ janayatvitīśvarasaṅkalpamūlādṛṣṭasya pravṛttiḥ
GSP33yaissi_u:661: nanu kartāramantaraiva kāraṇāntarataḥ kṣityādi bhavediti śaṅkāmantarnidhāya tatparihāramāha 'cetana'ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:663: tathā cādhiṣṭhātuḥ kārakacakraprayoktaḥ kartṛścetanasyāpekṣā kāryasāmānye 'syeveti kṣityādau sakartṛkatvaṃ nāpahnavārham /
GSP33yaissi_u:665: upādānadigocarāparokṣajñānamantarā ca tadadhiṣṭhānalakṣaṇasya kartṛtvasyāsambhavāt kṣityādikartṛḥ paramāṇvādisākṣātkāro 'pyāvaśyakaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:668: atrādhiṣṭhātṛtvarūpaṃ tat samarthyata iti parakṛtāsāṅgatyamiti śaṅkāyā nāvasara ityavadheyama /
GSP33yaissi_u:669: evaṃbhūtasya kṣityādikartṛtvasya sadā sarvadarśinaṃ sarvasamarthaṃ ceśvaraṃ vinānyatra jīveṣvasambhavānna taiḥ siddhasādhanamiti cātra vivakṣitam /
GSP33yaissi_u:672: yatra yatra kārye na dṛṣṭaḥ kartā,
GSP33yaissi_u:681: kāryatvasya sattvādvyabhicāra ityapi sukhāderapi pakṣāntarbhāvata eva nirastamityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:683: nanu tarhi jīvasya svasukhādau kartṛtvaṃ na syāditi vācyam /
GSP33yaissi_u:686: adṛṣṭakāraṇādhiṣṭhānaṃ tu sarvatra kārye paramātmana eveti dhyeyam /
GSP33yaissi_u:687: nanvevamapi svajñānādyarthapravṛttipūrvakāle niyamena svasya sākṣātkārābhāvāt svajñānādyupādānabhūtasvātmasākṣātkartṛtvaṃ tadā tasya nāstīti cet, na, ātmanaḥ
GSP33yaissi_u:689: svajñānādau svasya kartṛtvasya svasmṛtimātreṇāpi abhyupagantavyatvādvā na doṣaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:690: upādānādisākṣātkartṛpūrvakatvamiti niyamastu īśvareṇaiva tatra tatra nirvāhyeti ca na vismartavyama /
GSP33yaissi_u:692: vyabhicāraṃ parihṛtya siddhasādhanatāṃ pariharati 'na cobhaye' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:704: 'tatsiddhe' riti pāṭhe tu śaktimadīśvarasyaiva vilakṣaṇapramāṇena siddherityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:708: sarvasyārthasya kriyākārakaphalavargāntaḥ pātitayā sarvādhiṣṭhānaṃ tadarthaṃ sarvasākṣātkaraṇamapīśvarasya prāpte /
GSP33yaissi_u:711: yatra kāryatvaṃ tatra tatra samarthakartṛjanyatvamiti vyāpterityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:716: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ-yenākareṇa kartuḥ kāraṇatvaṃ tadrūpāvacchinnakartṛpūrvakatvenaiva kāryatvasya ghaṭādau vyāptirgṛhītā /
GSP33yaissi_u:717: kiñcidviṣayājñānādimattvena ca na ghaṭādau kāraṇatvaṃ kulālādeḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:719: anyaviṣaye jñānājñāne śaktyaśaktī vā aprayojake prakṛtakāryotpāde /
GSP33yaissi_u:728: arthāntaraviṣayaśaktyādyabhāvasya vyatireke prakṛtakāryasya vyatireka iti vyatirekasahacārasyāsiddheriti vār'thaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:737: atha vikalpamukhenārthāntaraviṣayakājñānādeḥ niyatapūrvavṛttitvamapi pratikṣipati 'api ce' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:740: nanu prakṛtakāryātiriktakatipayaviṣayājñānādi karturiṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ cetyatrāha 'athe' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:742: yathā kaścitpaṭakāraḥ ghaṭaṃ na jānāti kaścittu jānāti,
GSP33yaissi_u:743: kaścittvanyanna jānāti anyastu tajjānātīti prakṛtakarturanyānyaviṣayaṃ jñānamajñānaṃ cāvyavasthitaṃ dṛśyate /
GSP33yaissi_u:744: paṭādyajñānaṃ ghaṭādyajñānaṃ vā niyataṃ karturdurvacamiti tattadajñānasya tatra tatrānaikāntyānna hetutvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:745: sarvasyāpi kartuḥ kiñcidvastu niyamena na jñāyate iti tu durvacamevetyāha 'na cāstī' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:749: tathā ca tattadajñānasya tatra tatra vyabhicāre 'pi niruktarūpāvacchinnajñānābhāvasya niyatapūrvavṛttitvasambhava eveti cet,
GSP33yaissi_u:754: ekaṃ dehaṃ parityajya dehāntaraparigrahaṇaṃ kurvato jīvasya tadā/
GSP33yaissi_u:756: yogino yogabalājjīvato dehāntaragrahaṇaṃ kurvato jīvasya tadāśarīritvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:757: yogino yogabalājjīvato dehāntaragrahaṇaṃ saśarīrasyaiva dṛṣṭamityayogina ityuktam /
GSP33yaissi_u:762: tathā ca kartuḥ śarīratvaniyame na vyabhicāra iti cet ;
GSP33yaissi_u:768: evaṃ śarīropādāne kartṛtvaṃ jīvasyā śarīrasyaiveti samarthya śarīrapreraṇe kartṛtvamapyaśarīrasyaivetyāha 'kiñce' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:772: adhiṣṭhānakarmībhūtasya kāṣṭhāde stacchettṛtāvacchedakatvaṃ yathā na tadvaditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:778: atyantato 'sambaddhasyādhiṣṭheyena tadadhiṣṭhātṛtvasya kāṣṭhāsaṃbaddhasya kuṭhārasya cchettṛtvasyevāsaṃbhavādadhiṣṭheyasambandhinādhiṣṭhātrā bhavitavyamityeva niyamaḥ,
GSP33yaissi_u:780: preraṇaṃ prati preryasambandha eva hetuḥ na dehasambandha ityatra niyāmakaṃ pṛcchati 'kuta' iti /
GSP33yaissi_u:793: tathā ca dehatadavayavabhinnavastupravartane dehahastādivyāpārāpekṣāsyeveti neśvarasyānākṛteḥ paramāṇvādyadhiṣṭhātṛtvaṃ saṃbhavatītyāśayaḥ śaṅkituḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:796: preryasaṃbandho 'pyatra prerakasya jñānadvāraka eveti ca bodhyam /
GSP33yaissi_u:801: yena yena tadabhāve saṅkalpo na ghaṭetetyarthaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:805: tathā ca śarīrābhāve 'pi svahetoreva saṅkalpo bhaviṣyatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:806: nanu manasaḥ karaṇatve 'pi janyajñānādau dehasyāpyastyevāpekṣāvacchedakatayeti cedatra brūmaḥ-baddhajñānādāveva dehāpekṣā, nānyatra /
GSP33yaissi_u:807: 'manasaivaitān kāmān paśyan ramateya ete brahmaloke' 'manasaiva jagatsṛṣṭi'-mityādinā muktasyeśvarasya ca manovattvaṃ,
GSP33yaissi_u:810: īśvare nityajñānacikīrṣāprayatnavādināṃ tārkikāṇāṃ mate tu na tarāṃ śarīrādyapekṣā /
GSP33yaissi_u:811: atra manovattvāgantukasaṅkalpādisamarthanaṃ tu tadekadeśimatena vā siddhāntacchāyayā veti bodhyam /
GSP33yaissi_u:815: samarthakartṛpūrvakatvena kāryatvasya vyāptergṛhītatvāt tataḥ kṣityādau sidhyataḥ karturīśvarasyāśarīritvaiśvaryādyeva setsyati 'yakṣānurūpo bali' riti nyāyāt /
GSP33yaissi_u:822: sarīrābhāve 'pi prāyaṇāvāntaralayādau nityendriyatayā manasaḥ sattvātkālāvacchedena śarīravyāpyatvaṃ manaso nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:823: nanvevamapi saśarīrasyaiva kartṛtvaṃ tatra tatra dṛṣṭāmiti
GSP33yaissi_u:824: śarīrikartṛkatvena vyāptiḥ kāryatvasya kuto na gṛhyata ityatrāha 'yāvaddhī' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:825: dṛṣṭānuguṇaṃ kāryānugumatvena dṛṣṭamata eva vyāptyupayogi thadrūpaṃ tadavacchinnenaiva vyāptireṣṭavyā /
GSP33yaissi_u:835: akarmavaśyatvāśarīritvasarvajñatvādiviśiṣṭakartrā kāryatvasyāvinābhāvo ghaṭādau na dṛṣṭa iti śaṅkiturbhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:836: sāmānyadharmāvacchinnavyāptigrahādeva pakṣadharmatābalasahakārātpakṣīyasādhya viśeṣasiddhiriti hārdena pratibandīmāha 'atigahane' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:849: dhūmātparvate vahniviśeṣānumānāt kāryatvāt kṣityādau kartṛviśeṣānumānasya na vailakṣaṇyam /
GSP33yaissi_u:851: atha sapakṣadarśanamātreṇa sarvadharmāpādane pratibandī vivakṣurāha 'api ce' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:860: atrāyaṃ pratitarko vivakṣitaḥ-mano yadi paricchinnaparimāmavat syāt kriyāvadvā tarhi sparśavadbhavediti /
GSP33yaissi_u:864: yadyapi mahato vāyorgatiśīlasyāniyatādhiṣṭhānatvamudbhūtasparśavattvāt spārśanapratyakṣatvaṃ ca bhūyo dṛṣṭam /
GSP33yaissi_u:871: evaṃ rūpasparśaubhayatadanyatarodbhavasya bhūyo dṛṣṭatve 'pi cakṣuṣo rūpadiṣu rūpādiṣu
GSP33yaissi_u:873: cakṣuṣaḥ taijasamahatkaryatve rūpasparśānyatarodbhavaḥ syāditi prasaṅgo 'tra bodhyaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:887: tathā ca pratitarkāṇāṃ chinnamūlatvaṃ ca vivakṣitam /
GSP33yaissi_u:889: tulyanayena kratṛtve saśarīratvamiti niyamo 'pi nāstītyāśayavānāheśvaravādī 'hantatarhī' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:896: īśvarasya sa dharmo nitya evopeyata iti pakṣe ca dharmasāmānyasya vihitakriyājanyatvaniyamabhaṅgaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:905: īśvare 'pyabhimataviśeṣeṣu santi pramāṇānītyarthaḥ tānyeva prapañcayati 'yathā' iti /
GSP33yaissi_u:906: 'tathe' ti pāṭhe tu tathā hi nītayo dṛśyanta ityanvayaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:918: paramāṇvādigocarāvīśvarasya saṅkalpaprayatnau prasādhya sākṣātkāramapi tādṛśaṃ sādhayati 'tathe' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:925: na caitatsākṣātkartṛtvaṃ jīvānāmiti na taiḥ siddhasādhanam /
GSP33yaissi_u:927: atha sākṣādevātīndriyārthān pakṣīkṛtya pratyakṣaviṣayatvaṃ sādhayati 'pratyakṣam' iti /
GSP33yaissi_u:957: yathākarma phalapradatvāt svāmitvamapi sarvasya tasmin pratitiṣṭhatyeva /
